text: Ceradenia melanopus is a species of grammitid fern. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Polypodiaceae Category:Ferns of Ecuador Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Ferns of the Americas Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ceradenia melanopus
